name: redirecterr
description: Redirecterr is a self-hosted link redirection manager with analytics and link rules. It tracks visits and allows flexible redirects in a clean UI.
features: Link redirection: Create short, memorable URLs that redirect to longer destination addresses.
Visit analytics: Track click counts, referrer sources, and geographic data for each redirect link.
Custom rules: Define conditional redirects based on user agent, location, or time of day.
Link management: Edit, disable, or delete redirects through an intuitive web interface.
QR code generation: Create scannable QR codes for each redirect link for offline marketing.
Expiration dates: Set automatic deactivation times for temporary campaigns or time-limited offers.
Password protection: Restrict access to sensitive redirects with optional password requirements.
Click limits: Configure maximum click counts before links automatically expire or deactivate.
Custom slugs: Choose memorable short codes for your redirect URLs instead of random strings.
Dashboard reporting: View aggregate statistics and trends across all your redirect links.
API access: Create and manage redirects programmatically using REST endpoints.
Export data: Download analytics and link information in CSV format for external analysis.
